backend/main.mo: Defines types for exercises, workouts, recovery, user profiles, and includes a static exercise library for backend workout generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY.md: Deployment retry log documenting backend fixes, especially muscle‑group filter corrections and workout generation repairs.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, splash screens, manifest links, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React app handling authentication, routing between pages, and validation for generated workouts.
Modal UI for updating bodyweight with validation and profile update mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with tabs and a settings modal, handling vibration and navigation events.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseChangeMo: Shows a modal listing alternative exercises and records selected exercise changes to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding, settings access, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileLoadingSc: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/PullToRefresh.ts: Implements custom pull-to-refresh behavior with touch handling and animated indicator.
Fetches and displays muscle recovery data with colored indicators and optional weighted leg averages.
frontend/src/components/SettingsModal.ts: Provides a settings modal for editing user profile fields and saving updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an animated splash screen with app branding during startup.
frontend/src/components/StatusBar.tsx: Displays a sticky status bar showing the user's streak and today's date.
frontend/src/components/WorkoutShareModa: Modal component that generates share links and QR codes for workouts with copy and native share support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handles login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks and helpers for backend operations with validation, error handling, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Hook that manages screen wake lock with auto-reacquisition, error handling, and visibility event support.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based dark theme styling with system fonts, safe areas, and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/lib/profileCache.ts: Empty module for future profile caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Provides utilities to save, load, clear, and check active workout sessions in sessionStorage with 24‑hour expiry.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts nanosecond timestamps to milliseconds, validates ranges, and formats timestamps into readable dates.
Builds ordered workout sections by muscle group, including leg subsections and handling unexpected groups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing workout history, recovery data, and user metrics with refresh logic and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays past workouts with date formatting, volume conversion, and a calendar view of trained days.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen allowing authentication via Internet Identity with a branded UI and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/NewWorkoutPage.tsx: UI for selecting a workout type and triggering workout generation via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Form page for creating and saving a user profile with validation and backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays recovery state and weekly muscle group volume with refresh capability.
frontend/src/pages/SharedWorkoutPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for shared workout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutPreviewPage.ts: Validates and previews a generated workout, supports regenerating and changing exercises.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutSessionPage.ts: Handles active workout sessions including timers, logging sets, PR detection, and exercise changes.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines frontend-specific exercise, workout, recovery, and configuration types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking backend workout generator bugs, required fixes, and architectural notes for recovery logic and logging.
